articles.title: Ethical dilemma: Do computers with lab-grown brains have moral rights? - Study Finds
articles.description: Bio-computing has arrived. This next step in technology uses biological parts as hardware in new computational devices -- essentially a computer with a brain.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia — In a revolutionary leap from the pages of science fiction, “bio-computing” has arrived. This next step in technology uses biological parts as hardware in new computational devi… [+4058 chars]
